name: IGNITER - 002 (Evilmon)
description:
IGNITER is summoned from merging 1.2 EVIL coin with a gas stove. Older gas stoves, and kitchen that hosted murder or evil activities create a bigger, stronger IGNITER.

IGNITER loves kitchen and cows because it impersonates a bull and thinks it is one. 
Experiences showed that relationships implying IGNITER and cows always end smelling like grilled steak.

This EVILMON is well known of spectacle performers because of its ability to generate flames that disappear before becoming hurtful.

IGNITER has been airsummoned to every wallet that owns EVIL coin and interacted with @EvilCoin_tez.

IGNITER is a level 2 evolved EVILMON.
IGNITER can evolve.
